name: Commissioned Crews
desc:
Commission bonuses are always applied when you enter a market. 

However... as a last resort, when activated, this ship will receive special training or upgrades varying from the faction you're commissioned under.

name: Commissioned Crew Ban
desc: This ship will be marked to never accept any future Commission Bonus for any reason.
short: Deattach the ship's hull with the commissioned crew first!

name: Hegemony Armor Improvements
desc: Ship receives high quality armor plating produced in forges of Chicomoztoc, increases ship's armor by %s/%s/%s/%s points, depending on hull size.

name: Fourteenth Battlegroup Survivor
desc: Valued survivor from 14th Domain Battlegroup cannot simply be given post-Collapse armor plating improvements. Its pre-Collapse armor can still be maintained and kept in best shape possible. Ship ignores bonus provided by Hegemony Armor Improvements and instead increases ship's armor by %s points.

name: Fighter Supremacy
desc: Ship's nanoforges have been improved using pre-Collapse data, lowering the replacement time by %s/%s/%s/%s, depending on hull size. These nanoforges require less crew to operate, lowering skeleton crew requirement by %s.

name: Advanced Flux Capacitors
desc: Ships used by Tri-Tachyon Corporation and other compatible ships are upgraded boosted ship's flux capacity by %s. Affects ships of %s and %s design type.

name: Lion Training
desc: The ship's crews have been trained and constantly drilled on Sindrian doctrines. Receive additional bonuses when an Officer is on-board this ship. Increase the ship's maneuverability by %s. Increases the turn rate of all turrets by %s.

name: Lion's Eye
desc: Leadership of a Timid or Cautious officer makes shields more reactive, increasing the turn rate of the ship's shields and the rate at which they are raised by  %s.

name: Lion's Mane
desc: Leadership of Steady officer optimizes ship's maneuvering thrusters and motivates gunnery crews, granting %s bonus to maneuverability and increasing turn rate of all turrets by %s.

name: Lion's Maul
desc: Leadership of Aggressive or Reckless officer improves ship's targeting routines, increasing damage dealt to weapons and engines by %s.

name: Pirate Handiworks
desc: Pirates and smugglers on-board makes constant adjustments to make the ship less visible in space. The ship's sensor profile is reduced by %s.

name: PRISINE RESTORATIN
desc: Ochre Jane was one of the admirals of the Fourteenth Battlegroup. A failed mutiny in the Battlegroup and spending several time in a group of damaged cryopod as punishment caused brain damage in Jane. Even then, Jane did not lose her sense of strategy or lust for power, embodying this in her Mk.XIV line of ships. Ship's armor is increased by %s and flux capacity and dissipation are increased by %s.

name: Luddic Rituals
desc: Each missile has been made with utermost care and blessed by priest of Luddic Church to destroy their enemies. Confers a %s increase in missile health and %s/%s/%s/%s damage bonus toward shields of all missiles, rockets, bombs, and torpedoes, depending on hull size.

name: Path's Vision
desc: Pathers have performed modifications to ship's engines, increasing ship's top speed by %s/%s/%s/%s su/second, depending on hull size. Minor modifications to other systems have also been done, reducing the rate at which combat readiness degrades by %s.

name: United We Stand
desc:
"Then join hand in hand, brave Perseans all, by uniting we stand, by dividing we fall. In so righteous a cause let us hope to succeed and let none that oppose us stand in our way."

Receive commissioned bonuses from allied factions. Must redock at a market to reapply.

name: Alliance Sensor Array
desc: Applies all United We Stand hull mod to all eligible ships! Make sure the eligible ships have %s/%s/%s/%s spare ordnance points! Will auto-remove itself upon using.
